com.hyprmx.android.sdk
Interface HyprMXHelper.HyprMXListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
HyprMXActivity
Enclosing class:
HyprMXHelper
public static interface HyprMXHelper.HyprMXListener

Interface for clients to implement to receive notification when offers are completed or cancelled by the user. The methods defined within the listener are guaranteed to be called from within the context of the UI thread, so it's allowable for calls that affect UI to be executed within the callback. Note that this interface is only available to callers that either subclass HyprMXActivity or utilize the processActivityResult() method from their own Activity subclass's onActivityResult() method.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
bjdupuis

Method Detail

onOfferCompleted

void onOfferCompleted(com.hyprmx.android.sdk.api.data.Offer offer)
Called when the user completes the requirements for completing an offer.

Parameters:
offer - the offer that the user watched, containing all of the details of the offer.

onOfferCancelled

void onOfferCancelled(com.hyprmx.android.sdk.api.data.Offer offer)
Called when the user cancels an offer at any point during the presentation.

Parameters:
offer - the offer that the user watched, containing all of the details of the offer.

onNoContentAvailable

void onNoContentAvailable()
Called when no ad content could be loaded to be displayed in the View. HyprMXButton and HyprMXBanner views will be hidden by the time this method is called.

onUserOptedOut

void onUserOptedOut()
Called when the user has opted out of viewing splashscreens but a splashscreen request is sent. This allows the application to at least know that the splashscreen won't show.
